caption.p: GEE estimated measures of the intensity of PMS according to the Premenstrual Symptoms Screening Tool (PSST), Total score ( a), 14 symptoms ( b), and 5 interferences with daily activities ( c) in the Echium amoenum (EA) and the Placebo groups at 2 follow-ups regarding the interaction between time and the studied group and also adjusting for age and BMI. Patterns of mean changes differ between the EA group and the Placebo group
